SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.common

Interface Server

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerApp, ServerSocketHandler
public interface Server extends Remote
The Server interface defines the methods that the server must implement to support client interactions. It extends the Remote interface to support RMI (Remote Method Invocation).

  • Method Details

    • fetchRooms

      List<RoomInfo> fetchRooms(Client client) throws RemoteException
      Fetches the list of available rooms for the client.
      Parameters:
      client - the client requesting the room list
      Returns:
      a list of RoomInfo objects representing the available rooms
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • createRoom

      RoomInfo createRoom(Client client, String roomName, int numPlayers, String creatorUsername) throws RemoteException, AlreadyInRoomException, CreateRoomException
      Creates a new room.
      Parameters:
      client - the client creating the room
      roomName - the name of the room
      numPlayers - the number of players that will eventually be playing in the room
      creatorUsername - the username of the creator of the room
      Returns:
      if successful, RoomInfo with info about the created room
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a network issue while invoking the remote method
      AlreadyInRoomException - if the client making the request is associated with an already existing room
      CreateRoomException - if roomName or creatorUsername is invalid (too short or too long) or if numPlayers is invalid (too big or too small)

    • joinRoom

      RoomInfo joinRoom(Client client, String roomName, String username) throws RemoteException, AlreadyInRoomException, JoinRoomException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      Joins an existing room that has not already started.
      Parameters:
      client - the client trying to join the room
      roomName - the room that the client is trying to join
      username - the username of the player trying to join the room
      Returns:
      RoomInfo with room information
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a network issue while invoking the remote method
      AlreadyInRoomException - if the client making the request is associated with an already existing room
      JoinRoomException - if the room could not be joined (username already taken, max player number reached...)
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game in the room has already started
      IllegalArgumentException - if username is invalid (too short or too long)

    • readyUp

      RoomInfo readyUp(Client client, Color color) throws RemoteException, RoomException
      Marks a client as ready to play.
      Parameters:
      client - the client that is ready
      color - the chosen color of the client
      Returns:
      RoomInfo with updated room information
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      RoomException - if there is an error in the room

    • readyDown

      RoomInfo readyDown(Client client) throws RemoteException, RoomException
      Marks a client as no longer ready to play.
      Parameters:
      client - the client that is no longer ready
      Returns:
      RoomInfo with updated room information
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      RoomException - if there is an error in the room

    • leaveRoom

      boolean leaveRoom(Client client) throws RemoteException, RoomException
      Lets a client leave the room they are in.
      Parameters:
      client - the client leaving the room
      Returns:
      true if client left the room, false if the client was not in a room
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      RoomException - if there is an error in the room

    • executeAction

      void executeAction(Client client, GameAction action) throws RemoteException, InvalidActionException, NotYourTurnException, NotInGameException
      Executes a game action.
      Parameters:
      client - the client executing the action
      action - the game action to be executed
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid
      NotYourTurnException - if it is not the player's turn
      NotInGameException - if the client is not in a game

    • reconnect

      CompleteGameInfo reconnect(Client client, String roomName, String username) throws RemoteException, JoinRoomException, AlreadyInRoomException
      Reconnects a client to a game.
      Parameters:
      client - the client reconnecting
      roomName - the name of the room
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      CompleteGameInfo with game information
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      JoinRoomException - if the client cannot join the room
      AlreadyInRoomException - if the client is already in a room

    • ping

      void ping(Client client) throws RemoteException
      Pings the server to check if it is still responsive.
      Parameters:
      client - the client pinging the server
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • getClientHostAddress

      String getClientHostAddress() throws RemoteException
      Gets the host address of the client.
      Returns:
      the client host address
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • chatMessage

      void chatMessage(Client client, ChatMSG msg) throws RemoteException
      Sends a chat message.
      Parameters:
      client - the client sending the message
      msg - the chat message to be sent
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
